name: Dan's Life
description:
Made for the Pre-Made Jam by Rhaskia.

A Retro style Jump and Run.

There are 6 hidden flowers. Can you collect all of them?

Tips

You can change the direction of your dash if you press the corresponding button (W,A,S,D) 

If you hold Spacebar longer then you jump higher than normal

Licensing

The game was made with the Godot Engine:

The assets were created by Rhaskia and edited by me.
